17 #include <config.h>
18 
19 #include "g-gnulib.h"
20 
21 /* Specification.  */
22 #include "vasnprintf.h"
23 
24 #include <stdarg.h>
25 
26 char *
27 asnprintf (char *resultbuf, size_t *lengthp, const char *format, ...)
28 {
29   va_list args;
30   char *result;
31 
32   va_start (args, format);
33   result = vasnprintf (resultbuf, lengthp, format, args);
34   va_end (args);
35   return result;
36 }
